title: 很给力的超平坦村庄
author: c1410215
txt_content:
预设超平坦：2;5x7,5x89,3x133,3x129,3x56,2x22,4x152,2x89,4x41,5x42,4x4,4x16,6x4,3,2;1;village(size=15 distance=20),biome_1,lake,decoration
种子：
bageyalu

replies.author: c1410215
replies.txt_content: 顺便说一下，还有南瓜，附近也有甘蔗。本人版本：1.7.2

replies.author: Worf丶Horo
replies.txt_content: 超平坦村庄一拿就一堆
